plot: This is a history about few person and their life. Some of them are good, some are bad. Few days later they died in bus accident. On the Last Judgement they see their life and wondered, who will go to heaven and who will go to hell.
title: Pieklo i niebo
plot_es: This is a history about few person and their life. Some of them are good, some are bad. Few days later they died in bus accident. On the Last Judgement they see their life and wondered, who will go to heaven and who will go to hell.
